subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Organizers for the Nascar Nationwide series race at Circuit Gilles Villeneuve in Montreal signed a three-year deal to keep the event there. This year’s NAPA Auto Parts 200 will be held Aug. 30, a Sunday, with qualifying a day earlier. In its first two years, the Montreal event was held on Saturday with qualifying on Friday, on the same weekend that the Nascar Sprint Cup series was competing in another city.
